conversations.body_text: Hi Steven “sgrav” Gravlee,    I checked your order and it shows you purchased a VAM, not a VAM Pro. Could you please confirm a few details?    What type of telemetry/effect are you using (e.g., ABS, wheel slip, road impacts, RPM/engine vibration, etc.)?    Is the motor installed on the throttle pedal?    How long did you use it before it failed/stopped working?

1. The only effect I was using was wheel slip for accelerator pedal. With a high threshold as to not trigger unless necessary. 2. Yes the motor is installed on the throttle pedal. 3. Lasted around 10 hours of game time.
Hi Steven “sgrav” Gravlee,  We will send you a replacement VAM vibration motor.
